item.title: End UT-7 at I-15
item.description: End UT-7 at I-15 (Exit 2). Turn right for I-15 north to Salt Lake City; left for I-15 south to Las Vegas (Nevada). This is the western end of the Southern Parkway.

item.title: UT-7 West - Exit 1
item.description: UT-7 west approaching Exit 1 - Desert Color Parkway

item.title: UT-7 West - Exit 3
item.description: UT-7 west approaching Exit 3 - River Road

item.title: UT-7 West - Exit 6
item.description: UT-7 west at Exit 6 - Desert Canyons Parkway. UT-7 becomes a 4 lane freeway after this interchange westbound.

item.title: UT-7 West - Exit 7
item.description: UT-7 west approaching Exit 7 - Airport Parkway

item.title: UT-7 West - Exit 10
item.description: UT-7 west at Exit 10 - Warner Valley Road.

item.title: UT-7 West - Exit 10
item.description: UT-7 west approaching Exit 10 - Warner Valley Road

item.title: UT-7 West - Exit 15
item.description: UT-7 west approaching Exit 15 - Long Valley Road

item.title: UT-7 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-7 west. Distance to St. George Regional Airport and I-15.

item.title: Begin UT-7 West
item.description: Begin UT-7 West. This is the beginning of the Southern Parkway.

item.title: Sand Hollow Road at UT-7 West
item.description: Sand Hollow Road at UT-7 west. Turn right for UT-7 west; left to continue on Sand Hollow Road.

item.title: Sand Hollow Road at UT-7
item.description: Sand Hollow Road at UT-7. Turn right for UT-7.

item.title: End UT-7 at Sand Hollow Road
item.description: End UT-7 (Southern Parkway) at Sand Hollow Road.

item.title: End UT-7 at Sand Hollow Road
item.description: End UT-7 (Southern Parkway) at Sand Hollow Road. Turn left on Sand Hollow Road for Sand Hollow State Park.

item.title: Long Valley Road at UT-7 East
item.description: Long Valley Road (Exit 15) at UT-7 East to Hurricane.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 2
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 2 - UT-7 East/Southern Parkway. This is the south eastern end of the new St. George beltway.

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Exit 2
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 2 - UT-7 East/Southern Parkway. This is the last exit in Utah on I-15 south.
